name: Introduction to Earth Science
description: A course that introduces the study of Earth Science, including physical, chemical, and biological processes.

name: Mineralogy and Petrology
description: A course that covers the physical and chemical characteristics of minerals and rocks.

name: Stratigraphy and Sedimentation
description: A course that covers the study of the stratigraphic record and sedimentary processes.

name: Structural Geology and Tectonics
description: A course that covers the study of the structure of the Earth and the forces that shape it.

name: Geomorphology and Paleoenvironmental Reconstruction
description: A course that covers the study of landforms and the reconstruction of past environmental conditions.

name: Geochronology and Isotope Geochemistry
description: A course that covers the study of the age and geochemical composition of rocks and minerals.
